## Packages

Load the packages we need for this tutorial using the chunk below.

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
library(dsbox)
library(lubridate)
```

Analysis of the bikesharing data in September 2021

```{r}
dcbikeshare_sep <- read_csv("202109-capitalbikeshare-tripdata.csv") 
```
```{r}
dcbikeShare_clean <- dcbikeshare_sep %>%
  mutate(started_at = ymd_hms(started_at),
         ended_at = ymd_hms(ended_at)) %>%
  filter(mday(started_at) == 1,
         mday(ended_at) == 1) %>%
  mutate(start_hour = hour(started_at), duration = hour(ended_at) - start_hour)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = dcbikeShare_clean, mapping = aes(x=start_hour)) + 
  geom_histogram()
```
